channel.title: How Do You Change/Add Items In A Shop?
channel.description:
mmk, im working with fr33sc4p3 pkz soarce, and i would like to change the shop that party pete has in the dummy training area, from random stuff (pots, trimmed armor), to archer stuff (red hide, black d hide, arrows, karils, robin, obby rings, bows) so how would i do that? i already tried just changing the items, but i get some sort of error. so, if anyone could help me, that would be great :D
-Will[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 07:31:50 PM[/size][hr]this is what i want to edit:
[code] shop = 34 @whi@Stuff_=] 2 2 175 1000 157 1000 145 1000 163 1000 169 1000 139 1000 7535 1000 7336 1000 7462 1000 3105 1000 3751 1000 2615 1000 4131 10 2617 1000 2619 1000 2621 1000 6583 1000 0773 1000
[/code]

@Khasck wrote:

kay thanks

-Will

item.title: How Do You Change/Add Items In A Shop?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

You just change the item id or add one and then the amount that you want in the shop.

Read full topic
